EVA

Visual data management system. Features include declarative query language, storage management, deep learning, and hardware acceleration. Developed at Georgia Institute of Technology.

Home Installation Research Google Colab Version Beta Release

  • Download ZIP File
  • Download TAR Ball
  • View On GitHub

EVA Documentation

Run the following commands from this directory to compile the documentation. Note that eva must be already installed.

pip install -r requirements.txt
make html
open _build/html/index.html
